channel.title: Art on Derme's Coffee
channel.description: Recent content in Art on Derme's Coffee

item.title: Rotated Hexels!
item.description: So today I finally decided to pick up Hexels, which is a neat little tool to make minimalistic artwork. However I needed a rotated Hexel for my current project, which needed to be defined via the custom-shape tool. (Thanks to YellowAfterlife for pointing that feature out)
